sub_title: Sr. Software Engineer at New10 | ABN AMRO | Cloud computing | AWS | Node.js
summary:
With 11 years of experience in both IT and Business domains, I possess a strong background as a software engineer specialised in cloud solutions for high-scale distributed systems and microservices architecture. I have extensive expertise in utilising various cloud services, programming languages, and frameworks, particularly within Amazon Web Services (AWS). Additionally,  I am a highly skilled and results-driven professional specialised in business process management. As a Business Process Management Consultant, I have successfully partnered with multiple companies in Brazil and Europe, ensuring their internal business processes align with strategic objectives. By leveraging my expertise in business process mapping, documentation, and improvement, I have empowered organisations to streamline operations, resolve process gaps, reduce costs, and expand their businesses. With a strong focus on aligning processes with business strategies, I have facilitated enhanced control, optimized workflows, and fostered a culture of continuous improvement. My track record includes successfully implementing process improvements, driving efficiency, and delivering measurable results.


My skill set includes consultancy, coaching and training in business process mapping, documentation, and continuous improvement. I am proficient in a range of technologies such as .NET, Node.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, SQL Server, DynamoDB, MongoDB, and Docker. I am well-versed in industry-standard tools such as AWS Lambda, API Gateway, Cognito, Secrets Manager, S3, CloudWatch, SQS, SNS, EC2, VPC, and more.
 
Furthermore, I possess experience in BPMN 2.0 and have utilised tools like, Bizagi Modeler, Lucidchart, Confluence, Supravizio BPM, HEFLO.  I have also implemented systems integration and business process automation solutions using BPMS, .NET C#, JavaScript, and web services (SOAP and REST).

profile_positions.description:
At New10, an ABN AMRO initiative, I have been serving as a Senior Software Engineer within the Support Domain team. In this role, I am instrumental in creating and maintaining crucial tools and microservices that support the core operations of business loans and mortgages.

Key Responsibilities:
I am responsible for the continuous maintenance and improvement of the support services such as authorization, identity, transactions and annual figures service - which deal with crucial support operations of New10, leveraging AWS Cognito, Dynamodb, serverless framwork, terraform, Lambda functions, Node.js with TypeScript. I actively contribute to their functionality and performance optimisation.

To guarantee software quality, I also implement comprehensive automated tests, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing using Jest. Additionally, I collaborate closely with other teams, aligning our implementations and fostering effective communication and collaboration within the agile Scrum framework.

I also proactively work on incident handling through monitoring and observability practices. By leveraging appropriate tools and technologies, I help maintain a high level of system performance, availability, and reliability.

Disaster Recovery Planning:
As the primary lead in my team, I take responsibility for the disaster recovery plan. This involves implementing measures to safeguard our systems and data, ensuring their resilience and enabling swift recovery in the event of a disaster.

In my role at New10, I have the opportunity to contribute to the optimisation of critical business support operations by developing and maintaining reliable and efficient software solutions. Through collaboration, agile methodologies, and a proactive approach to incident management and disaster recovery, I've been playing an important role in supporting the company's mission of providing entrepreneurs with easy and fast access to business financing.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
At Storyteq, a leading SaS company based in the Netherlands, I collaborated with a dynamic and innovative team focused on empowering creative and marketing teams in renowned brands. Our mission was to automate creative production and drive on-brand marketing campaigns with superior content across markets and channels, all while delivering faster results.

Key Skills:
Within this vibrant environment, I excelled in implementing internal features for the Storyteq product, leveraging REST APIs and a microservices architecture built on Node.js. I also gained expertise in cloud computing with Google Cloud Platform (GCP), effectively utilizing infrastructure as code and containers with Kubernetes and Docker. My responsibilities encompassed backend development, automated testing, and front-end development using vue.js.

Main Frameworks | Stacks:
To ensure seamless operations and continuous deployment, I leveraged the power of DevOps practices on the Google Cloud Platform, deploying and managing applications with Kubernetes and Docker. I established robust CI/CD pipelines using GitLab, enabling efficient and automated workflows. In the backend, I showcased my proficiency in Node.js, while on the front-end, I demonstrated my expertise with vue.js. My work methodology involved Agile practices, such as Scrum and Jira, ensuring efficient collaboration and delivery. Additionally, I worked with Mysql and RabbitMQ to ensure robust data management and messaging capabilities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer | Devops

profile_positions.description:
At OutSystems, a prominent SaaS business company based in Portugal, I contributed to their innovative cloud-based platform that enables software development without code.

Working within an agile team, I played a key role in planning, designing, and implementing solutions to effectively manage, automate, and monitor AWS cloud infrastructure provisioning. My responsibilities encompassed the DevOps and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) domains, ensuring the seamless operation, high availability, and scalability of tenants on AWS.

DevOps / IaC:
In this capacity, I excelled in building services to automate cloud infrastructure provisioning, leveraging technologies such as the CDK framework, Python, Docker, Serverless, and Lambda functions. Through these solutions, I orchestrated the provisioning of various AWS cloud resources, including EC2 instances, AMIs, Load balancers, VPCs, NAT Gateways, RDS, S3, Route53, and more.

Additionally, I showcased my expertise in building REST APIs and implementing robust CI/CD pipelines. Leveraging Python, Serverless framework, Docker, AWS Lambda functions, API Gateway, DynamoDB, CloudWatch, SQS, AWS Cognito, Secrets Manager, GitHub Actions, and Azure DevOps, I ensured the seamless deployment and continuous integration of applications.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Liqui.do, a noteworthy fintech company based in Portugal, specializes in facilitating the purchase and rental of industrial equipment for businesses. The rental process closely resembles a loan or mortgage application, encompassing key stages such as application, risk assessment, contract signing, etc.

My association with Liqui.do initially began as a consultancy engagement while I was working for HEFLO in Brazil. Over a span of 4 months, I played a pivotal role in mapping and documenting their internal business processes, which included customer journey, risk assessment, HR processes, purchasing, marketing, and IT. The success of this project led to an invitation to join the Liqui.do team when I relocated to Portugal in 2019.

Key Skills:
Within Liqui.do, I leveraged my expertise in developing and integrating internal solutions using a range of technologies. This included Salesforce (APEX), AWS Lambda functions, API Gateway, SAM Framework, and Node.js. By effectively utilizing these tools, I contributed to the seamless functioning and optimization of their internal operations.

Additionally, my proficiency in business process modeling and documentation using BPMN 2.0 enabled me to create comprehensive and standardized representations of Liqui.do's workflows. This facilitated clear understanding, effective communication, and continuous improvement of their processes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
HEFLO, a well-established SaaS company in Brazil, holds a pivotal role in my professional journey, where I had the privilege of working for nearly 5 years. During my tenure, I assumed diverse responsibilities, ranging from designing and implementing architectural solutions to promoting the product as it became commercially available.

As an integral member of the HEFLO team, I played a crucial role in shaping the project from its inception. I made significant contributions in defining scope requirements, formulating rules, and establishing comprehensive specifications for BPMN 2.0. Additionally, I actively participated in the development of components, leveraging technologies like Node.js, .NET and Amazon Web Services. This involved working with microservices architecture and integrating systems, among other functionalities and APIs.

Key Skills:
My expertise extends to cloud computing using Amazon AWS, where I proficiently utilised lambda functions, API Gateway, CloudWatch, SQS, SNS, EC2, and S3. On the development front, I showcased my proficiency in technologies such as .NET C#, Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, and various web-related frameworks such as Web API, LESS, HTML5, jQuery, CSS, Bootstrap, and Knockout. Furthermore, I demonstrated my competency in database management systems, including SQL Server, MySQL, and DynamoDB. Leveraging these skills, I successfully developed RESTful web services, collaborated on version control with Git, and implemented continuous integration with Jenkins. My work methodology aligned with Agile principles, particularly Scrum.

In addition to my technical expertise, I played a crucial role in BPM consulting, coaching, and training. Fluent in both English and Portuguese, I conducted webinars on BPMN 2.0, covering fundamental concepts as well as advanced topics. I also delivered technical and commercial presentations on BPM solutions, effectively showcasing the benefits and functionalities of HEFLO's powerful no-code BPMS web tool.
profile_positions.title: Full-stack .NET | Node.Js Developer | BPM Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Genesys Business Consulting is a business consultancy company in Brazil. During my tenure, I had the opportunity to work on diverse projects for multiple companies, ensuring their internal business processes aligned with their strategic objectives. By fostering this alignment, I successfully aided these organisations in reducing costs and establishing efficient controls and monitoring mechanisms.

Key Highlights:
I leveraged my expertise in BPMN to effectively map, model, and enhance business processes for various clients. This involved understanding their unique requirements, identifying areas for improvement, and implementing optimised workflows.

• Projects Coordination:
I assumed the responsibility of coordinating projects, overseeing their successful execution from initiation to completion. This involved defining project scope, managing resources, facilitating communication among stakeholders, and ensuring timely delivery of project milestones.

• Problem, Incident & Change Management:
Within Genesys, I actively participated in problem, incident, and change management activities. This included identifying and resolving issues, implementing corrective measures, and effectively managing change requests to ensure smooth operations.

• Requirements Management:
As a skilled professional in requirement gathering, I engaged with stakeholders to elicit and document their business needs. By conducting thorough analyses, I translated these requirements into comprehensive specifications that guided the development and integration of systems.

• Systems Integration and Coding Proficiency:
I possess extensive experience in systems integration, having worked on numerous projects involving various technologies. By leveraging my coding skills in Python, JavaScript, C#, SQL Server, MySQL, WSDL, and RESTful web services, I successfully facilitated seamless integration between systems, ensuring efficient data exchange and streamlined processes.
profile_positions.title: Systems Analyst | BPM Developer

company.name: Cobway Consultoria de Informática e Negócios Ltda.

profile_positions.company: Cobway Consultoria de Informática e Negócios Ltda.
profile_positions.description:
Cobway used to be an innovative startup based in Brazil working in the insurance industry with its web platform designed for seamless operations and sales.

During my tenure at Cobway, I assumed a role as a software programmer with a strong focus on Business Process Management (BPM). I successfully facilitated the implementation of systems integrations and the automation of business processes, leveraging my expertise in IronPython, C#, JavaScript, SQL Server, MySQL, WSDL Web services, and XML.

Key Highlights:
• Requirements Gathering and Analysis:
I actively engaged with stakeholders to gather and analyse their requirements, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of their needs and objectives. By meticulously documenting these requirements, I facilitated effective communication and alignment between the technical team and stakeholders.

• Business Process Mapping, Redesign, and Automation with BPMS:
Utilising my proficiency in BPM, I played a key role in mapping, redesigning, and automating business processes using a Business Process Management Suite (BPMS). This enabled Cobway to streamline their operations, increase efficiency, and optimize resource allocation.

• Business Process Improvement, Dashboard, and Business Reports Development:
I contributed to the continuous improvement of business processes by identifying areas for enhancement and implementing necessary changes. Additionally, I developed intuitive dashboards and generated insightful business reports, empowering stakeholders with real-time data-driven insights for informed decision-making.

As a software programmer with a specialisation in BPM, I actively supported Cobway in achieving their strategic goals. By implementing robust systems integrations and automating critical business processes, I played a vital role in optimising operations, enhancing customer experiences, and driving the growth and success of Cobway's web platform.
profile_positions.title: Systems Analyst | BPM Developer

profile_positions.description:
At ConnectCom, I held a role in analyzing and diagnosing incidents and technical requests, ensuring timely resolution by coordinating with the respective teams.

One of my notable contributions was the development of an automated Excel spreadsheet, utilizing VBA programming and data integration with MS Access. This innovative solution significantly improved the control and management of technician attendances, streamlining processes and enhancing efficiency.

By leveraging my programming skills and expertise in data integration, I successfully created a user-friendly tool that improved attendance tracking and reporting.
profile_positions.title: It Support Analyst

profile_positions.description: Business reports developement with MS Excel and Access, by using VBA, data importing with T-SQL programming | SQL Server. IT technical support, computers maintenance and systems configuration.
